quotes.quote: Brazil was, is, and will be in fashion.
I see the future of Brazil as the future of the planet.
Brazil eats, sleeps and drinks football. It lives football!
They have a joy for life in Brazil unlike any country I've ever seen.
Brazil is bigger than Europe, wilder than Africa, and weirder than Baffin Land.
Brazil is not what you see but what you feel. Once you spend time here - a week, two weeks - you get in the vibe. It's really intoxicating.
Brazil is where I belong, the place that feels like home. They love their family, their country and God, and are not afraid to let anybody know it.
Brazil is crazy about football. People, they wait for this moment, but this doesn't mean we are going to win the championship. That is the problem.
Brazil has rediscovered itself, and this rediscovery is being expressed in its people's enthusiasm and their desire to mobilize to face the huge problems that lie ahead of us.
The most beautiful thing about Brazil that I always find that is so unlike any other place I've been in the world is the diversity of its people.
Brazil has no parties, only acronyms.
No one knows anything about the fashion industry in Brazil. They don't care what you do. They just want the beach and the sun and the fun. I feel the freest and the happiest there.
The forests of Russia and Brazil are the lungs of the Earth.
Brazil - they're so good it's like they are running round the pitch playing with themselves.
Brazil is my way to see the world. Being born in that country means: "you don't have a wall separating the physical reality from the magical reality."
Brazil is one of the biggest Latin American countries, the biggest, no doubt, and, more importantly, it is a country with immense development potential.
Brazil's got everything to be a great country for Brazilians and for immigrants.
Brazil has people in some places with so difficult situations. They prefer to smile than cry because they love life. They love to be happy. That's Brazilian style.
